Located in City Hall at 527 E. Commerce St

The Fairfield Municipal Court is responsible for the adjudication of State and City ordinance violations that are classified as Class C misdemeanors. The Court conducts hearings and trials, collects fines, issues warrants, and reports convictions for offenses which occurred within the City of Fairfield. The Municipal Court observes the same holidays as other City offices.
